author: Simon Difford
description: This gin laced cocktail is flavoured with apricot liqueur which is balanced and made more complex by dry vermouth. A dash of orange bitters and a light lemon zest twist subtly serve to unify all. (Go easy with the bitters and zest.)
name: Entente Cordiale Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
